name: Bacon, Apple and Brie Panini
author: Angela
summary: I had a panini like this at a winery in the Napa Valley, so this is my best attempt to recreate it! These make an amazing lunch and would also be great for bridal showers, baby showers, etc... All you have to do is cut them up into bite-size pieces and insert a toothpick!
directions: Heat a panini press to medium-high heat according to manufacturer's instructions
Butter 1 side of each slice of bread
Flip 1 slice and spread mustard on top; add cheese
Place apple slices on the cheese
Cover with the other slice of bread, buttered side-up
Place sandwich into the panini press and press down
Grill until lightly browned, about 3 minutes per side
